author: Xbox
description:
Fresh heroes, familiar villains, and all-new ways to power up – Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 6 Season 3: Super has landed. Get a crash course in superhero-ing, grapple against Mask Maker Daigo, and grow stronger with every battle. The training arc starts now!

Instantly unlock Robin when you purchase the Super Battle Pass or access it through Fortnite Crew. And keep an eye on the sky... Superman will land as an unlockable Outfit in the Super Battle Pass later in July!

author: Xbox
description:
Immerse yourself in a new Martian underground adventure with Blind Descent, an open-world survival craft game that unveils the mysteries of the Martian depths.
Play solo or with friends as you search for the missing team. Adapt and mutate to survive in this bizarre alien world. To be released on Xbox Series X|S.

author: Xbox
description:
This is a story about death.

Available July 22 on Xbox Series X|S!

Luto is a psychological horror experience where you take on the role of someone unable to leave their home. Every attempt to escape will lead you deeper into the unknown, where nothing is as it seems and everything will test your senses.

• What lies behind loss: feel the void left by the absence of a loved one, where despair grows, fed by anxiety and depression. Day after day...

• Between reality and fiction: delve into an enigmatic place and explore its labyrinthine paths full of secrets. The truth has many faces, and you might not like the one you find.

• Will not let you go: experience unsettling terror that envelops your senses, with fears lurking

around every corner. Darkness does not only dwell in shadows.
• Never.

author: Xbox
description:
One Move Away is a cozy, first-person puzzle game where you pack your belongings for another move and embark on a new chapter in life. With each move, you step into the lives of three unique characters, uncovering their personal stories through the items they take with them or leave behind.

Coming To Xbox Series X | S in 2025.

author: Xbox
description:
Welcome home, Hobbit! Tales of the Shire launches on Xbox Series X|S July 29th.

Explore The Shire, where you'll have new opportunities to savor and discover throughout the changing seasons. With the passage of time, enjoy new colorful landscapes, rhythms, and moments to cherish, all at just the right pace. Get a taste of Hobbit life in The Shire, filled with exploration, trade, and celebration of the small joys that make each day special! 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/tales-of-the-shire-a-the-lord-of-the-rings-game/9PKKJBVPP4GW/0010

author: Xbox
description:
Requiem for the dead. Nightmare for the living.

Resident Evil Requiem is the highly anticipated ninth title in the mainline Resident Evil series. Prepare to escape death in a heart-stopping experience that will chill you to your core.
 
A new era of survival horror begins when Resident Evil Requiem launches February 27, 2026 for Xbox Series X|S.

author: Xbox
description:
The upcoming swordplay action game from Capcom, Onimusha: Way of the Sword, has a brand new trailer: Formidable Foes Emerge.

Stay tuned as new information continues to be revealed, including more details on new characters such as Sasaki Ganryu, who wields an Oni Gauntlet, as well as scenes showcasing the nail-biting gameplay.

Coming to Xbox Series X|S in 2026!

*Footage represents a game that is still in development.

©CAPCOM
